long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gun Mayhem 2 is a free gun fighting game for 2 up to 4 players. It is once again time to cause some mayhem and chaos, with the firearm-toting arena game sequel the world has been waiting for.

Gun Mayhem is back and version 2 is more challenging than ever. The bots are smarter, the guns are flashier and the campaign mode is sure to keep you coming back for more. Just like in its predecessor you will have to blast your opponents off the platforms as they rudely refuse to stand still.

Quick reflexes, clever moves and steely determination will help you win the day. Lock and load your guns, and let's show those jokers that you are still the king. 
Enjoy Gun Mayhem 2!

How to Play
Controls: 
Arrows = Move / Jump
Z = Shoot
X = Dynamite
